Sentence.value: Thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura (TTP) is a blood disorder that causes blood clots to form in small blood vessels.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura|C0034155]] (TTP) is a [[blood disorder|C0018939]] that causes [[blood clots|C0302148]] to form in [[small blood vessels|C0225988]].

Sentence.value: This disease may be caused by problems with an enzyme (a type of protein) that is involved in blood clotting.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: This disease may be caused by problems with an [[enzyme|C0014442]] (a type of protein) that is involved in [[blood clotting|C0005778]].

Sentence.value: It removes your abnormal plasma and replaces it with normal plasma from a healthy donor.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: It removes your abnormal [[plasma|C0032105]] and replaces it with [[normal plasma|C0440742]] from a healthy donor.

Sentence.value: Plasma is the liquid part of blood that contains blood cells and platelets.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Plasma is the liquid part of [[blood|C0005767]] that contains [[blood cells|C0005773]] and platelets.

Sentence.value: Most people who undergo plasma exchange recover completely.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Most [[people|C0027361]] who undergo [[plasma exchange|C0032113]] recover completely.

Sentence.value: Call your health care provider if you have any unexplained bleeding.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Call your [[health care provider|C0018724]] if you have any unexplained [[bleeding|C0019080]].
